Class WauzPetAbilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs.pets.WauzPetAbilities

extends java.lang.Object
    A class for handling the usage of pet abilities.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:

        Gets a random ability obtainable at the given level.
        Parameters:
        breedingLevel - The breeding level.
        Returns:

      • tryToUse

        public static boolean tryToUse(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Lets a player try to activate their pet's ability. Only works when a pet with valid ability is active.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who tries to activate the ability.
        Returns:
        If the ability usage was successful.
